title: QOOBIT Navi
description: Turbocharge your Content Browser experience by typing or pasting in paths to quickly navigate to assets and folders.
longDescription:
Throughout the many versions of UE, there are many systems and interpretations of what a file/folder path is. However, there is no easy way to copy a unified path or to navigate to a file/folder in one click. This plugin solves all of that for you.


With the many ways available to copy a path, this plugin’s widget will get you directly to the resolved asset in the Content Browser.


Whether you’re working on a solo project, or if you’re part of a massive production team, this tool will easily save you hours a week.


Code Plugins are only supported for release into the latest 3 engine versions, so if you need the 5.1 plugin, feel free to reach out to us on our discord.


Demo Video: https://youtu.be/UPR29TYDjhc

Full Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/10NVQk_H2WC4yiEt64IQoJiSykLozy0jW3uBT9TF-1FY

Discord Support: https://discord.gg/uDtYHhC9zd
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Copy Asset Object Path
  • Quick navigation to Content Browser assets and folders with:
  • Windows Project Absolute Path
  • Content Browser Asset References
  • Asset Object Paths
  • UE 5.4+ /All/ Folder Paths

Code Modules:

  • PythonScriptPlugin 

Number of Blueprints: 1

Number of C++ Classes: 0

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows Editor

Supported Target Build Platforms: N/A


Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/10NVQk_H2WC4yiEt64IQoJiSykLozy0jW3uBT9TF-1FY

Important/Additional Notes: Currently only supports UE 5.1-5.4 as certain Content Browser Python libraries are only available for version UE 5.1 or greater.
